item.title: SARS CoV 2 Interactome 3D
item.description: This project is a web-based server for navigating and visualizing possible interactions between SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19) and human host proteins. I gained valuable experience working on this project, as this is my first time contributing to scientific research. I was responsible for building the serverside API and the client webpage. I developed the API using PHP and the webpage using both JavaScript and PHP. I also learned a lot about the research topic itself, working with a team, and the process of doing scientific research.

item.title: Blockchain Specialization
item.description: I started taking the Blockchain Specialization offered by University at Buffalo on Coursera. The specialization consists of four courses: Blockchain Basics Smart Contracts Decentralized Applications (Dapps) Blockchain Platforms I have completed the first course so far (View Certificate) and started taking the second one.

item.title: NixOS Contributions
item.description: I started using NixOS as my primary operating system in late 2021. As I was migrating my dotfiles for NixOS, some packages I wanted to use were missing from the NixOS package collection, Nixpkgs. Therefore, I contributed the following package definitions to Nixpkgs: d0c-s4vage/lookatme: An interactive, terminal-based markdown presenter. View Pull Request sindrets/winshift.nvim: Rearrange Neovim windows with ease. View Pull Request skywind3000/asyncrun.vim: Run async tasks in Vim/NeoVim and output to quickfix list.
